meaning_str.bing:
adj. 原子能的；核能的；核武器的；核子的
n. 核武器主义者
网络. 原子核的；核心的；中心的

原子能的；核能的；核武器的；核子的
原子核的；核心的；中心的

核能的；原子能的；原子核的；核武器的；核动力的；[物]核子的；[生]细胞核的
<非正式>核武器（尤指核导弹）；有核国

1.en: He said the nuclear reactor was intact and radiation levels were normal.
1.cn: 目前核反应堆工作正常，潜艇内的辐射指标符合标准。

2.en: Lee Grodzins supervised my senior thesis in nuclear physics and provided me with a wonderful research experience and with his friendship.
2.cn: 李·格罗津斯指导我做核物理的毕业论文，教给我宝贵的研究经验，也给了我许多友爱。

3.en: He said the province has focused on clean solutions by developing solar power, windmills, bio-fuels and nuclear plants.
3.cn: 罗省长说，海南省高端重视开发利用清洁能源，包括太阳能，风能，生物质能源以及核能。

0.en: I don't know. Nuclear war. Accidentally being buried alive.
0.cn: 我也不知道，核战，不小心被活埋了。

1.en: A young, untested leader with nuclear ambition. Kim Jong-un.
1.cn: 年轻，放荡不羁，有着实现核武的野心，他就是金正恩。

2.en: Well, a nuclear war would do it too. Busy in there?
2.cn: 发生核战争我也会来。你在忙吗？

3.en: The advent of the nuclear age may have accelerated the mutation process.
3.cn: 核子时代的来临，可能加快了突变的发生。

4.en: Ha! That's like saying the people near the nuclear explosion didn't do so well.
4.cn: 哈，就像是那些经历过核爆炸的人也会出毛病。

5.en: Don't make me invoke the nuclear option. Because I will selfie bomb you every 5 minutes.
5.cn: 别逼我使出绝招，我会用自拍轰炸你，每5分钟一张。

6.en: It's probably just as well, the Russians are gonna drop a nuclear bomb on us any day now.
6.cn: 也许一切还会照旧，即使俄罗斯人随时会往我们这扔个核弹。

7.en: Riley, explain the role of uranium in nuclear fission. I don't know. Yeah, you're a threat.
7.cn: 莱丽，解释一下铀在核裂变时的角色。我不知道。就你这样还能威胁到我啊。

8.en: All right, there's a nuclear holocaust, I'm the last man on Earth. Would you go out with me? Yeah.
8.cn: 好吧，有一场核子浩劫，我是地球上最后一个男人，你会和我约会吗？会吧。

9.en: Five years ago I was escorting a nuclear engineer out of Iran, somebody shot at my tires near Odessa.
9.cn: 五年前，我护送一个核物理工程师离开中东，有人在敖德萨附近打爆了我的车胎。

10.en: She can walk into this office and order a nuclear strike if she was in the mood. And that's only two of them.
10.cn: 要是她心血来潮，她可以轻易走进这间办公室，发动一次核武器战争。而这只不过是两个变种人。

11.en: This is the USS Gerald Ford, a nuclear-powered aircraft carrier lying in a dry dock in Newport News, Virginia.
11.cn: 这里是美国军舰，吉拉德·福特，一个核动力航空母舰，坐落在福吉尼亚纽波特纽斯的一个船坞。

12.en: We're already hearing this is gonna be a very long lockout. We're about to go into the nuclear winter of the NBA.
12.cn: 我们已经听说这将是一个长期的停摆，我们将进入NBA的严冬。

13.en: Today, they use a mix of energy sources, from nuclear to renewables, like solar and wind, from hydro to natural gas.
13.cn: 如今，电站使用多种能源有核电，可再生能源，如太阳能和风能，还有水力和天然气。

14.en: The material is a blend of taffeta and high density body armor. Fully armed and loaded. And they glow. That's nuclear.
14.cn: 由高档材料制作而成有高密度的盔甲防护，藏着上膛的武器，还有发着光的核武器。

15.en: Come on, Leonard if you roll a six, Penny dies horribly in a nuclear meltdown. See what I mean when I say the fun is real?
15.cn: 快点，莱纳德，如果你掷了六，佩妮就会在核外泄中惨死。明白我为什么说乐趣是实实在在的了吗？

16.en: Is that Raj and Howard? Possibly, but unverified. Will you just let us in. Luckily for you, this is not a nuclear reactor.
16.cn: 是不是拉杰和霍华德？可能，但是还没有核对。让我们进去不？你很幸运，这并不是核反应堆。

17.en: It would take more than 4 million cows to equal the output of just one nuclear power plant. But maybe that's not the point.
17.cn: 那将需要四百多万头牛，才能与一个核能计划的产量持平。但这也许不是重点。

18.en: A Russian nuclear warhead, branded safe by the IMF, clipped the Transamerica Pyramid before plunging into the San Francisco bay.
18.cn: 一枚俄罗斯核弹头。碟中谍小组出手，安全保证。在其掉落进旧金山湾之前从泛美金字塔上砸穿了过去。

19.en: I remember one summer when he was 13, he built a small nuclear reactor in the shed and told everybody he was gonna provide free electricity for the whole town.
19.cn: 我记得他13岁时的夏天他在小屋里做了一个小型原子反应堆，然后跟大家说他会为全镇人提供免费电力。
